burst_calc Documentation

burst_calc: burst_calc

electrode

  • Homepage: http://ros.org/wiki/burst_calc

    • burst_calc is a ROS package for detecting bursts of spiking activity in a neural network. A center of activity trajectory (CAT) is calculated for each burst which is then forwarded to a dish teleop node to facilitate ARM movement. The package consists of a burst creator node, a CAT creator node, and several helper classes. This package relies on the other packages in the arm_project stack to perform properly.

    Code API

    • Run the burst creator node by creating an BurstCreator object.
    • Run the CAT creator node by creating a CatCreator object.

    ROS API

    List of nodes:

    • burst_creator
    • cat_creator

    burst_creator

    arm_control receives dish states from a receiver node and then detects and creates burst sequences, which are forwarded to the CAT creator node.

    Usage

    $ rosrun burst_calc burst_creator

    ROS topics

    Subscribes to:

    • "dish_states_to_burst_creator": [neuro_recv/dish_state] incoming dish states

    Publishes to:

    • "bursts_to_cat_creator": [burst_calc/burst] bursts sent to the CAT creator node
    • "bursts_to_dish_viz": [burst_calc/burst] bursts sent to the visualizer node
    • "ranges_to_cat_creator": [burst_calc/ranges] channel ranges sent to the CAT creator node
    • "ranges_to_dish_viz": [burst_calc/ranges] channel ranges sent to the visualizer node

    ROS parameters

    Reads the following parameters from the parameter server

    • buffer_size
    • stdev_mult
    • burst_window

    Sets the following parameters on the parameter server

    • N/A

    ROS services

    • "time_service": [time_server/time_srv] polls system time to keep the node in sync

    cat_creator

    cat_creator receives bursts from the burst creator node and calculates a CAT for each burst. It then publishes the CAT to the dish teleop node for ARM movement.

    Usage

    $ rosrun burst_calc cat_creator

    ROS topics

    Subscribes to:

    • "bursts_to_cat_creator": [burst_calc/burst] bursts received from the burst creator node
    • "ranges_to_cat_creator": [burst_calc/ranges] channel ranges received from the burst creator node

    Publishes to:

    • "cats": [burst_calc/cat] CAT messages for the dish teleop node
    • "cas": [burst_calc/ca] CA messages for the visualizer node

    ROS parameters

    Reads the following parameters from the parameter server

    • cat_log_path

    Sets the following parameters on the parameter server

    • N/A

    ROS services

    • N/A
